Script.string: The goddess of hunters knows a thing or two about camouflage...
Mortals, you have swept away the shadows that once gathered here in Velika.
Samael, how did the shadows reach your soul?
How could the argons have tempted you...when you were so strong?
The forces of corruption are at work elsewhere in the world.
Your work is not yet done.
You will find that this gift is more tangible than my last blessing for you.
But the weapon does not make the hunter. Your determination, valor--and kinship with your allies--those are the weapons that our enemies truly fear.
For you, this is a beginning, not an end.
Wherever you go, may Father Arun and Mother Shara hold you in their dreams.
